backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and social challenges with access control, including challenge creation, participation checks, invitation codes, and blob-based recording storage, enforced by role-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report describing implemented frontend features, affected files, dependencies, test requirements, and confidence levels for multiple challenge-related UI and routing steps.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all frontend source files, documenting app structure, hooks, components, screens, styling, and i18n setup.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark themes, and base styles with RTL-aware utilities for consistent theming across the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry document that mounts the React application and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication-aware, state-based screen routing between placeholders, manage challenge, and in-challenge screens.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing a centered, card-style app container with a dynamically positioned language switcher based on text direction.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication control button integrating Internet Identity login/logout with translated labels and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer-only diagnostics panel showing authentication state, principal ID, and controls to refresh cached backend challenge state.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two informational dialog popups using buttons and modals, with all text sourced from the i18n translation context.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Provides a dropdown menu to switch application language, updating the i18n context and respecting text direction (LTR/RTL).
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Generic wrapper component that handles loading, error, and success states for React Query results and renders retry UI on failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Custom hook for recording audio via the browser MediaRecorder API, managing recording state, errors, and returning a recorded audio Blob.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Derives authentication status and principal string from the Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, persisted identities, and login state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks and mutations for user profiles, challenge lifecycle, and related backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Defines a React Query hook to fetch the authenticated user's challenge status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty or placeholder file for i18n-related setup or future configuration.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Provides an i18n context with language selection, translation lookup, persistence in localStorage, and automatic document direction updates.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Empty or placeholder index file for exporting i18n modules.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.json: English translation locale file; content not shown in this snippet.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/es.json: Spanish translation locale file; content not shown in this snippet.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the main i18n translation dictionary for the app, covering UI text for multiple screens and features across several major languages including RTL support.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base, theme variables for light/dark modes, global typography, and RTL-aware layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and imports global styles.
Landing screen placeholder showing the app title, feature highlights, authentication CTA, and footer using translated strings.
Placeholder screen for authenticated users without an active challenge, handling join-by-invitation flow with URL/session persistence and mutation hooks.
Placeholder for creating and managing a challenge, including start date selection, invitation code generation, participant management, and creator actions.
frontend/src/screens/Screen5ManageChalle: Management screen for an active challenge that lists participants, supports refresh, and allows the user to leave the challenge.
Simple placeholder screen describing the challenge state and next steps, with optional navigation to an edit/manage view.
Implements the main in-challenge screen where creators record, save, play, and delete audio reflections for fixed daily assignments, and view participant recordings. It coordinates challenge context, participant selection, day navigation, audio recording/playback, and related API queries/mutations.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed set of five assignment templates reused across each day of the 7-day challenge, including IDs, titles, and detailed instructions. Also exports shared types and helpers related to assignment structure.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Provides helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear the active challenge ID in sessionStorage so challenge context survives page refreshes. Used primarily to restore state for non-creators.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random, human-friendly uppercase alphanumeric invitation codes with ambiguous characters removed. Used for challenge invitation flows.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, and clears shareable invitation URLs containing challenge IDs and invitation codes. Handles URL query parameters without requiring a page reload.
Normalizes error messages for display and suppresses a known bogus migration message by replacing it with a generic error. Accepts unknown error shapes and extracts a user-friendly string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across both query-string and hash-based routing. Supports sessionStorage fallback to keep parameters available across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens via CSS variables, animations, and layout defaults. Enables dark mode via class and registers typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
